channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Lidar-maker Luminar files for bankruptcy
item.description: Luminar, the lidar manufacturer that rode a wave of self-driving car hype to land deals with major automakers like Volvo and Mercedes-Benz, filed for bankruptcy Monday. The company has been mired in a legal fight with its founder and former CEO, Austin Russell, who was ousted earlier this year following an ethics inquiry. As part […]

item.title: Test du Ecovacs Deebot mini : le mini robot aspirateur qui a tout d’un grand
item.description: L’Ecovacs Deebot Mini est l’un des rares mini-robots aspirateurs du marché. Pensé pour les petits intérieurs, il se veut aussi efficace que séduisant grâce à son format compact. Alors que la concurrence reste assez minimaliste, Ecovacs propose un véritable robot aspirateur-laveur, aussi complet que les modèles classiques, avec une base capable d’autovidange et de nettoyer la vadrouille. Sur le papier, c’est très séduisant. Mais cela se vérifie-t-il au quotidien ? ...

item.title: Cozy Earth Is Offering 40 Percent off Pajamas Right Now
item.description: Rarely are deals better than what you see on Black Friday, but Cozy Earth's upping the ante for this pajama sale.

item.title: 'Slop' is Merriam-Webster's word of the year
item.description: Merriam-Webster has selected "slop" for the dictionary company's 2025 word of the year. The leading lexicographers define slop as "digital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence." We've seen an absolute deluge of AI slop this year, from fake movie trailers on YouTube to AI-generated bands on Spotify. Not even food delivery like Uber Eats could escape the onslaught of AI-generated garbage that no one asked for. It's gotten to the point that half the videos my well-meaning parents send me on social media are AI-generated videos of dogs. Th...

item.title: Tesla Is Testing Robotaxis Without Safety Drivers — or Riders
item.description: Elon Musk confirmed that Tesla is testing its robotaxis without any safety monitors.

item.title: The 10 best white elephant gifts worth fighting over for 2025
item.description: If you have a white elephant gift exchange at work this year or with friends and family, there’s a good chance you’re scrambling right now to find a good gift — or decipher what even makes a good white elephant gift. The possible origins of the term “white elephant” provide one way of looking at it: According to legend, the King of Siam would give a white elephant to courtiers who had upset them. It was a far more devious punishment than simply having them executed. The recipient had no choice but to simply thank the king for such an opulent gift, knowing that they likely could not afford the ...

item.title: With New ‘Ask this Book’ Kindle Feature, Amazon Wants Lost Readers to Ask AI for Help
item.description: There used to be this thing called “flipping back a few pages.”

item.title: Watch Michael Cera Return to Edgar Wright’s World In New ‘Running Man’ Clip
item.description: Glen Powell stars in the adaptation of the Stephen King novel, which hits digital December 16.

item.title: Cadillac and Chevy are getting native Apple Music
item.description: General Motors is adding native Apple Music to the infotainment systems of select 2025 model year Cadillac and Chevrolet vehicles, the company announced today. The news comes as the automaker is racing to add more native app experiences to some of its vehicles to make up for the absence of popular phone mirroring services like […]

item.title: Threads adds new communities, tests badges for highly engaged members
item.description: Threads, which has more than 150 million daily active users, adds more communities to its platform.

item.title: Garmin just leaked its Vivosmart 6 tracker – and it might come with one major upgrade over its predecessor
item.description: Garmin’s Vivosmart 6 fitness tracker just leaked out with a tempting new feature.

item.title: ‘Fallout’ Season 2 Is Opening Up the Vault a Little Early
item.description: Want to return to the wasteland a little earlier than Amazon planned? Okie dokie!

item.title: iPhone, MacBook : préparez-vous à une flambée des prix en 2026
item.description: Même les géants ont leurs faiblesses. Apple s'apprête à renégocier des contrats cruciaux pour la mémoire de ses appareils, et la facture risque d'être salée. Une augmentation des coûts de production qui pourrait bien finir par se répercuter sur le ticket de caisse.

item.title: C’est une première historique : la marque chinoise Chery veut s’attaquer officiellement aux 24 Heures du Mans
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Chery, via sa marque premium Exeed, vient d'annoncer son intention de participer aux mythiques 24 Heures du Mans d'ici cinq ans.

item.title: It’s Time to Give MP3 Players a Second Chance
item.description: Spotify ain't what it used to be, and we may have the perfect antidote.

item.title: Emerging ‘Super Flu’ Strain Is Spreading Fast. Here’s What You Need to Know
item.description: The UK is facing a surge of hospitalizations fueled by the novel variant subclade K. And the U.S. is likely next.

item.title: Lidar-maker Luminar files for bankruptcy
item.description: The filing marks the end of a tumultuous year full of layoffs, executive departures, and piling debts.

item.title: Amazon fait un super prix ce SSD externe ultra‑rapide de 2 To avant la flambée des prix du stockage
item.description: À l’heure où les prix de la mémoire vive s’envolent et que la pénurie menace les composants, le Crucial X10 Pro se présente comme une solution de stockage rapide, robuste et abordable. Actuellement en promotion dans sa version 2 To, ce SSD externe devient un allié précieux.

item.title: Hurry — its your last chance to get HBO Max for free via DashPass
item.description: You can still get HBO Max for free with an annual DashPass plan for one more day. Secure the streaming deal by Dec. 16.

item.title: This home security cam monitors your property 24/7 with 'unlimited' battery life – and it costs less than you might expect
item.description: IMOU's latest point-and-tilt camera uses a solar panel, high-capacity battery, and power-efficient recording for constant surveillance.

item.title: Google’s turning off its dark web monitoring service that scoured data breaches for your info
item.description: Google notified users in an email today that, beginning next month, it will stop sending its dark web reports, an opt-in feature that alerted users when Google detected their personal information on the dark web, as reported by 9to5Google. On January 15th, Google will stop scanning for that data, like contact info and home addresses, […]

item.title: Get the Sony Inzone M9 II 27-inch 4K gaming monitor for $250 less at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 15, you can get the Sony Inzone M9 II 27-inch 4K gaming monitor for $698, down from $949.99, at Amazon.

item.title: Traveling this holiday? Save $30 on a four-pack of Apple AirTags before you take off.
item.description: A four-pack of Apple AirTags is on sale at Amazon for $69.99, down from the normal price of $99. That's a 29% discount.

item.title: Nvidia Wants To Be Your Open Source Model Provider
item.description: AI infrastructure dominance isn't enough. Nvidia wants in on the model world too.

item.title: The Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are down to their lowest price ever, but for a limited time only
item.description: The first generation Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are just $265 at Best Buy for Dec. 15 only.

item.title: Get 22 Percent Off One of Our (and Taylor Swift’s) Favorite Pillows
item.description: Eagle-eyed Swifties have ID’d the star’s pillow brand in a recent TV show appearance, and it’s one of my favorites as well. Coop is having a special sale to commemorate the event.

item.title: National security experts warn extremist groups are experimenting with AI. Here’s how
item.description: According to experts and spy agencies, AI could be a powerful tool for militant groups when recruiting. As the rest of the world rushes to harness the power of artificial intelligence, militant groups also are experimenting with the technology, even if they aren’t sure exactly what to do with it.For extremist organizations, AI could be a powerful tool for recruiting new members, churning out realistic deepfake images and refining their cyberattacks, national security experts and spy agencies have warned.Someone posting on a pro-Islamic State group website last month urged other IS supporters t...

item.title: T-Mobile is giving away free Samsung Galaxy S25 phones — heres how to qualify for the deal
item.description: T-Mobile is giving away free Samsung Galaxy S25 phones if you switch to the T-Mobile Essentials promo plan this holiday season.

item.title: Fallout Season 2 is premiering early. Heres when.
item.description: Prime Video announced that "Fallout" Season 2 would be airing a day early. Here's when you can watch.

item.title: Read Dead Redemption 2 gratuit le 31 décembre : la liste des jeux Epic Games offerts en fuite et elle donne bien envie
item.description: L’Epic Games Store prépare un nouveau coup d’éclat pour la fin d’année. Après avoir offert Hogwarts Legacy dès le 11 décembre, une fuite relayée sur les réseaux chinois laisse entrevoir une impressionnante liste de seize titres supplémentaires, parmi lesquels Red Dead Redemption 2 ou Detroit : Become Human.

item.title: Dreaming of a White Christmas? Don’t Hold Your Breath
item.description: After a very cold and snowy start to December, temperatures will shift toward unseasonable warmth just in time for Christmas.

item.title: There's still time — here are 25 gift ideas from Walmart that arrive before Christmas
item.description: I've hand-picked my favorite last-minute gifts at Walmart that arrive before Christmas, featuring deals from Apple, Dyson, Keurig, and more.

item.title: The Bose QuietComfort headphones are down to one of. their best prices ever
item.description: The Bose QuietComfort headphones are on sale for $170.05 at Amazon, putting them about $10 away from their record-low Black Friday pricing.

item.title: Test du Framework Desktop : ne le commandez pas avant d’avoir lu ça
item.description: Framework nous a habitués à un dogme quasi-religieux : tout doit être démontable, tout doit être remplaçable. Et pourtant, en ouvrant ce "Desktop", on tombe sur une hérésie : 128 Go de mémoire soudée à la carte mère, inamovible pour l'éternité. Est-ce que Framework a vendu son âme au diable ? Pas vraiment, on vous explique pourquoi.

item.title: Our favorite vacuum under $500 is now even cheaper
item.description: As of Dec. 15, the 3i G10+ robot vacuum and mop combo is $199.99, down from $449.99.

item.title: « On est très confiants » : comment Volkswagen compte sur la Chine et sa voiture électrique à 25 000 € pour se sortir de l’impasse
item.description: Après des années d'investissements dans l'électrique, Volkswagen va enfin commencer à récolter les fruits de son investissement. La marque allemande a dépassé Tesla sur le marché européen des véhicules 100 % électriques et prépare une offensive avec l'arrivée de l'ID.Polo à 25 000 euros.

item.title: Tesla robotaxis spotted on public roads without safety monitors
item.description: After years of false promises and missed deadlines, several Tesla vehicles have been spotted over the weekend driving autonomously without safety monitors on public roads in Austin. For months, Tesla's robotaxis in Austin and San Francisco have included safety monitors with access to a kill switch in case of emergency - a fallback that Waymo […]

item.title: Les astronomes stupéfaits : un trou noir a transformé une étoile en arme cosmique
item.description: L’histoire ressemble à de la science-fiction. Pourtant, c’est bien ce que des astronomes ont observé dans l'Univers. Un trou noir supermassif qui se sert des restes d’une étoile qu’il a déchiquetée pour en frapper une autre.

item.title: Fallout season 2 is streaming one day early
item.description: The second season of Fallout is debuting one day earlier than previously announced: the new season will now launch on Tuesday, December 16th at 9PM ET / 6PM PT on Prime Video, Amazon says. The season will have eight episodes that will premiere weekly on Wednesdays (besides this first episode), with the season finale airing […]

item.title: What is the release date for The Mighty Nein episode 7 on Prime Video?
item.description: Here's when The Mighty Nein episode 7 will be released on Amazon's streaming platform.

item.title: 5 of the best free movies to stream on Tubi, Pluto TV, Samsung TV Plus, and more this week (December 15)
item.description: From epic biographical comedies to underrated dramas, there’s plenty to watch on the best free streaming services this week.

item.title: Voici le meilleur téléviseur LCD Mini-LED de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Le meilleur téléviseur LCD Mini-LED testé par Frandroid est le Soyn Bravia 9. Découvrez pourquoi ce produit a reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos de sa catégorie.

item.title: Zoom brings its AI assistant to the web with access to free users
item.description: Zoom is allowing free users to try its AI assistant in limited capacity

item.title: Your Roomba will still work despite iRobots bankruptcy filing, but dont rule out unplanned obsolescence
item.description: iRobot going bankrupt doesn't mean that Roombas will stop working, or that they'll stop selling Roombas. But the future is still iffy.

item.title: Fortnite Winterfest 2025 start date — here's what we know about this year's Christmas event
item.description: Here's when Fortnite Winterfest 2025 starts, and what we know about the Christmas skins and cosmetics so far. More on the teaser released this week.

item.title: Avant-goût des Frandroid Awards 2025 et 3 Matinales : ne loupez pas notre programme Twitch de la semaine
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du 15 décembre, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous mardi, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter d'une édition spéciale Frandroid Awards 2025.

item.title: Samsung 48S90F : ce TV 4K OLED 144 Hz compact est 400 € moins cher à l’approche de Noël
item.description: Officialisé en 2025, le TV Samsung TQ48S90F est un modèle OLED haut de gamme qui devrait ravir aussi bien les cinéphiles que les gamers exigeants. Actuellement, Son-Vidéo le propose à 801 euros au lieu de 1 190 euros.

item.title: Why You Should Remember the Roomba, Even After iRobot Is Kaput
item.description: While iRobot is selling itself off as scrap, let's remember what actually makes a good robovac.

item.title: 'Banning VPNs for kids is the dumbest possible fix' – Windscribe CEO
item.description: While age verification for VPN apps would set a 'terrible precedent'
